name: DieForFreedom
description:
This is a game about a group of lab rats, trying to escape their destiny of a terrible death, by dying horrificly. Find the different ways to clean the path for your friends to escape and give the ultimate sacrifice.

 

Controls:

Mouse to turn the head

 The left mouse button to punch

W, A, S, D to move

Space to jump

Shift to run

E to interact

Scroll to zoom in and out

ESC for the menu

Credits:

Music: Snatch - Opening Titles
Animations: Mixamo
